title: 3 Steps to Repair a Regular or Enchanted Bow in Minecraft

steps.title: Interact with an anvil.
steps.content: Interact with an anvil. If you don't have an anvil handy, you can craft one using 3 Iron Blocks and 4 Iron Ingots. [1] X Research source Alternatively, you can use your Inventory's crafting, a Crafting Table , or a Grindstone to repair a bow, but this will remove any enchantments. However, you can always get another enchantment with enchanting books.

steps.title: Place two bows in the anvil.
steps.content: Place two bows in the anvil. Though it may seem counterproductive, you must use an item of the same type to repair it. If you have two bows with low Durability, they can be used to repair one like new. Bows can be crafted at a Crafting Table with 3 String and 3 Sticks.

steps.title: Place the repaired bow in your inventory.
steps.content: Place the repaired bow in your inventory. You'll see the repaired bow on the right side of the menu. Placing it in your inventory will confirm the repair. You can now use your repaired bow.
